install.name: Flickr Set
install.author: Graham Crockford
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 Planet Angel. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module shows a random image from a flickr set

param.name: setid
param.label: Set ID
param.description: The set ID to display from Flickr

param.name: url
param.label: Link to
param.description: The URL that clicking an image should take you to

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: The width to which to scale the image

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
